name: PollBuzzer
overview:
PollBuzzer™ is a real-time, dynamic consumer research platform, offering our clients immediate survey results and our panelists a simple way to get paid for their opinions.

PollBuzzer is a real-time, dynamic survey platform which saves our clients time and money by making the survey process considerably more efficient. Clients send single-question surveys to our consumer panel and receive their results in as little as an hour. PollBuzzer’s Question Wizard™ user interface lets clients write their question, tailor their respondent pool by the exact demographic, geographic and socio-economic characteristics that are most important to them, and choose their turnaround time. At the end of their survey, they receive an email with a formatted Excel file of the results, as well as the underlying demographic and socio-economic characteristics of each respondent.

Most importantly, clients’ questions and answers are automatically saved as the building blocks of custom panels that are unique to the client. Clients can ask follow-up questions of these custom panels whenever they need to find out new information. Our custom panel follow-up questions run 90% response rates, meaning that they can use PollBuzzer to create on-call, quantitative focus groups that they can rely on for fast, accurate consumer opinions.

Our panelists earn $1 for answering a single question. The questions come from businesses that want and value their opinions. There’s no cost to sign up, panelists can opt out at any time, and best of all, panelists have complete control over what you do with the earnings.
